name: Every Direction: O
description:
Welcome to O: the rhythm game with a slight twist.

Inspired by games like DDR, "O" utilizes all 360 degrees for arrows to fall. The player must use the arrow keys to input the corresponding arrow in time with the music. Feel the rhythm in every direction!

Programming: Cringenut

Art and Audio: Cor.3

Additional Art: LoquatRooster

Additional Resources:

https://marketplace.yoyogames.com/assets/9061/midi-reader

https://managore.itch.io/m5x7

https://managore.itch.io/m6x11

Made for Rhythm Jam 2021, hosted by Harman Kamboj, Arcy, and SkyanSam.
